xpath.h3: Comprehensive Open Source ERP for Educational Institutes

div.p:
OpenEduCat is a product developed by Tech-Receptives Solutions Pvt. Ltd., an expert company focusing in providing unique open source solutions.
In due course we accumulated a team of strong, experienced, creative, talented and dedicated engineers and designers.
Our products apply unique and powerful technology that helps educational institutes manage, connect, communicate and collaborate effectively among students, teachers and back office.

Education is an integral part of our society -- it enables individuals, community and other section of the society to endure the hardships of life with knowledge and intellect. Open Source, on the other hand, acts as a fuel to education and other acts of freedom in the software related field.

TechReceptives understand both Open Source and Educational needs of the society and have come up their novel approach for educational institute -- a full open source ERP solution, that provides the educational institute for managing different kinds of activities related to management and other collaborative efforts.
